Zeroshell is a small [[Linux distribution]] for [[servers]] and [[embedded systems]] which aims to provide [[network service]]s. As its name implies, you don't need to use a [[shell (computing)]] to administer and configure Zeroshell, because you can use a web based [[Graphical user interface]].
Zeroshell is a small [[Linux distribution]] for [[servers]] and [[embedded systems]] which aims to provide [[network service]]s. As its name implies, you don't need to use a [[shell (computing)]] to administer and configure Zeroshell, because you can use a web based [[Graphical user interface]].
â
Zeroshell is available as [[LiveCD]] and [[CompactFlash]] images, and [[VMware]] virtual machines.
